XIII.i.3.H.2.c
.
Responsibility for Notifying Claimants and Handling Disagreements
HAC is solely responsible for notifying claimants of a decision regarding their entitlement to CHAMPVA.
HAC and the Board of Veteransâ€™ Appeals have sole jurisdiction over legacy appeals and requests for decision review under
38 CFR 3.2500
pertaining to CHAMPVA entitlement determinations.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H - Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs (CHAMPVA) Eligibility Determinations
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H
